entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
